text: thæcring kar sanuk phidk lab neux klab taw thi xallxhˌ ca thrng rab nan khux sahrab brrda phu thi kratha khwam chaw doy rutheamithungkarn theanan læw phwk khea sanuk phidk lab neux klab taw nı wela xan kıl chn hela ni læa xallxhˌ ca thrng xphaythosʹ hı kæ phwk khea læa xallxhˌ pen phuthrng rxbru phuthrng pricha yan
